text: Lai Chi Kok North () is one of the 25 constituencies in the Sham Shui Po District of Hong Kong which was created in 2007. The constituency loosely covers northern part of Lai Chi Kok with the estimated population of 15,472. == Councillors represented == {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 2007 | Chong Chi-tat | Democratic |- |style="background-color: " | | 2011 | Bruce Li Ki-fung | Nonpartisan |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | Chum Tak-shing | ADPL |- |} == Election results == ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ==References== Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sham Shui Po District Council Category:2007 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 2007 Category:Lai Chi Kok
title: Lai Chi Kok North (constituency)
